Welcome To Products Analytics

# Product Name Prduct Image Price Status Status Summary Company Name Actions
{{i+1}} {{data.productName}} {{data.price}} {{data.status}} {{data.status === 1 ? 'InStock':'Out of Stock'}} {{data.companyName}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ProductService } from 'src/app/Shared/Services/product.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-products-analytics', templateUrl: './products-analytics.component.html', styleUrls: ['./products-analytics.component.css'] }) export class ProductsAnalyticsComponent { productArray:any=[] constructor(private ProductService:ProductService){} ngOnInit():void{this.populateProductArray()} populateProductArray(){ this.ProductService.GetAllProducts().subscribe((ResponseComingFromBackend:any)=>{ ResponseComingFromBackend.Result.forEach((element:any) => { if(element.softDeleteStatus!==1){ this.productArray.push(element); } }); }) } }
